mapper.sql: id, school_id, school_name, school_type, focus_targets_numbers, screening_org_name, screening_notice_id, screening_task_id, screening_org_id,screening_plan_id, district_id, avg_left_vision, avg_right_vision, low_vision_numbers, low_vision_ratio, wearing_glasses_numbers, wearing_glasses_ratio, myopia_numbers, myopia_ratio, ametropia_numbers, ametropia_ratio, vision_label0_numbers, vision_label0_ratio, vision_label1_numbers, vision_label1_ratio, vision_label2_numbers, vision_label2_ratio, vision_label3_numbers, vision_label3_ratio, key_warning_numbers, treatment_advice_numbers, treatment_advice_ratio, plan_screening_numbers, real_screening_numbers, valid_screening_numbers, myopia_level_light,myopia_level_middle,myopia_level_high,myopia_level_insufficient, update_time, create_time
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO m_school_vision_statistic (screening_notice_id, screening_task_id, screening_plan_id, district_id, screening_org_id, screening_org_name, school_id, school_name, school_type, focus_targets_numbers, avg_left_vision, avg_right_vision, low_vision_numbers, low_vision_ratio, wearing_glasses_numbers, wearing_glasses_ratio, myopia_numbers, myopia_ratio, ametropia_numbers, ametropia_ratio, vision_label0_numbers, vision_label0_ratio, vision_label1_numbers, vision_label1_ratio, vision_label2_numbers, vision_label2_ratio, vision_label3_numbers, vision_label3_ratio, key_warning_numbers, treatment_advice_numbers, treatment_advice_ratio, plan_screening_numbers, real_screening_numbers, valid_screening_numbers, myopia_level_light,myopia_level_middle,myopia_level_high,myopia_level_insufficient) VALUES
(#{entity.screeningNoticeId}, #{entity.screeningTaskId}, #{entity.screeningPlanId}, #{entity.districtId}, #{entity.screeningOrgId}, #{entity.screeningOrgName}, #{entity.schoolId}, #{entity.schoolName}, #{entity.schoolType}, #{entity.focusTargetsNumbers}, #{entity.avgLeftVision}, #{entity.avgRightVision}, #{entity.lowVisionNumbers}, #{entity.lowVisionRatio}, #{entity.wearingGlassesNumbers}, #{entity.wearingGlassesRatio}, #{entity.myopiaNumbers}, #{entity.myopiaRatio}, #{entity.ametropiaNumbers}, #{entity.ametropiaRatio}, #{entity.visionLabel0Numbers}, #{entity.visionLabel0Ratio}, #{entity.visionLabel1Numbers}, #{entity.visionLabel1Ratio}, #{entity.visionLabel2Numbers}, #{entity.visionLabel2Ratio}, #{entity.visionLabel3Numbers}, #{entity.visionLabel3Ratio}, #{entity.keyWarningNumbers}, #{entity.treatmentAdviceNumbers}, #{entity.treatmentAdviceRatio}, #{entity.planScreeningNumbers}, #{entity.realScreeningNumbers}, #{entity.validScreeningNumbers}, #{entity.myopiaLevelLight},#{entity.myopiaLevelMiddle},#{entity.myopiaLevelHigh},#{entity.myopiaLevelInsufficient})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE focus_targets_numbers=values(focus_targets_numbers), avg_left_vision=values(avg_left_vision), avg_right_vision=values(avg_right_vision), low_vision_numbers=values(low_vision_numbers), low_vision_ratio=values(low_vision_ratio), wearing_glasses_numbers=values(wearing_glasses_numbers),wearing_glasses_ratio=values(wearing_glasses_ratio), myopia_numbers=values(myopia_numbers), myopia_ratio=values(myopia_ratio), ametropia_numbers=values(ametropia_numbers), ametropia_ratio=values(ametropia_ratio), vision_label0_numbers=values(vision_label0_numbers),vision_label0_ratio=values(vision_label0_ratio), vision_label1_numbers=values(vision_label1_numbers),vision_label1_ratio=values(vision_label1_ratio), vision_label2_numbers=values(vision_label2_numbers), vision_label2_ratio=values(vision_label2_ratio), vision_label3_numbers=values(vision_label3_numbers), vision_label3_ratio=values(vision_label3_ratio), key_warning_numbers=values(key_warning_numbers),treatment_advice_numbers=values(treatment_advice_numbers), treatment_advice_ratio=values(treatment_advice_ratio), plan_screening_numbers=values(plan_screening_numbers), real_screening_numbers=values(real_screening_numbers), valid_screening_numbers=values(valid_screening_numbers), myopia_level_light=values(myopia_level_light),myopia_level_middle=values(myopia_level_middle),myopia_level_high=values(myopia_level_high),myopia_level_insufficient=values(myopia_level_insufficient), update_time = now()
